desc: Natural Mattress Shipped in a Box All natural latex mattress is made chemicals free, no heave materials, toxins are used. Natural Talalay Latex is naturally hypo allergenic, dust mites resistant, ultra durable. There is NO sagging, off gassing or any smell, not hot during the sleep like memory foams, MADE IN CANADA

layout.text: Medium Firm to Firm Hypo - Allergenic Bamboo Mattress Proudly Made in Canada
